sentences.en: An abbreviation for the prefix kilo , that is, 1000 in decimal notation.
sentences.cn: 前缀kilo(千)的缩写, 即十进制数的1000.

sentences.en: Crew loading a 53 - 65 KE training torpedo into the tube of a Kilo class submarine.
sentences.cn: 组员装填一枚操作型53-65KE鱼雷进入“基洛”(Kilo)级潜艇的发射管之内.

sentences.en: Crew loading an opertional 53 - 65 KE torpedo into the launch tube of a Kilo class submarine.
sentences.cn: 组员装填53-65KE训练鱼雷进入“基洛”(Kilo)级潜艇的发射管之内.

sentences.en: For engineering purposes, a larger unit called the kilo - calorie is adopted.
sentences.cn: 工程问题则使用较大的单位即 千卡 表示.

sentences.en: He'd lost ten kilos in weight.
sentences.cn: 他的体重已经减了10公斤。

sentences.en: How much does one kilo cost?
I must buy a kilo of coffee today.
sentences.cn: 我今天得去买一公斤咖啡.

sentences.en: I weighed out half a kilo of flour and added it to the mixture.
sentences.cn: 我秤了半公斤面粉,加到混合物中.

sentences.en: I'd like a kilo of pasta.
sentences.cn: 我想要一千克的意大利面。

sentences.en: It doesn't matter . But one kilo of each.
sentences.cn: 不要紧, 每样买一公斤.

sentences.en: Me and my mate went to score a kilo of amphetamine down in London.
sentences.cn: 我和爱人去伦敦市区搞到了一公斤苯丙胺。

sentences.en: OK, a special to you, 2.5 yuan a kilo.
sentences.cn: 好吧, 给你个特价, 2.5元一公斤吧.

sentences.en: The Asians obliged, air-shipping some of their kilo bars and gold bangles to refineries in Switzerland for recasting back into 400 oz bars.
sentences.cn: 亚洲人满足他们，将一部分以千克为单位的金条和金手镯空运至瑞士的精炼商，重新把它们加工为400盎司的金条。

sentences.en: The caves extend for some 18 kilo-metres.
The fruit costs 30 pence per kilo.
The price of grapes had shot up to 32 francs a kilo.
sentences.cn: 葡萄价格大幅上涨，达到每公斤32法郎。

sentences.en: The work kilo is often used as a prefix.
There's a whole kilo here,'she said.
This kind of chocolate is retailed at one pound a kilo.
sentences.cn: 这种巧克力糖零售每公斤一英镑。

words.tran_cn: [计量] 公里；[计量] 千米（等于kilometre）
